title: 36C3 Fahrplan App
subtitle: You are invited to join the project. It is not just about coding!
description:
Session for people who want to join the project I will shortly introduce you into the history and the current state of the project. Currently, the app is maintained by one person and used by many more. It would be great if people want to join to sustain the project for the future and help with developing it further. The years old codebase is waiting for you with lecacy Java but also Kotlin. Besides programming there is enough to do which does not require you to write code such as
  • translation
  • design
  • documentation
  • public relations
  • outreach
  • communication with users
and many more.
